Description: UP FOR BIDS IS A ESP-LTD EC-1000 METAL AXE. THIS IS AN OLDER ONE BELIEVE TO BE 2008 MODEL AND MADE IN KOREA. GUITAR HAS THE SATIN/MAT BLACK FINISH WITH GOLD HARDWARE.THE WHOLE GUITAR IS BOUNDED IN A YELLOWISH BINDING AND LOOKS GREAT. THIS ALSO HAS A NICE DARK EBONY FRETBOARD,ABALONE FLAG INLAYS,TONE PROS LOCKING BRIDGE AND TAIL PIECE,LOCKING ESP TUNERS AND A SET OF HOT ACTIVE EMG HUMBUCKERS TO MAKE THIS A SCORCHING METAL MACHINE.THIS WAS MY MAIN GUITAR AND IT WAS A WORK HORSE THAT ALWAYS PRODUCED.IT DOES HAVE ROAD WEAR WITH DINGS,MARKS,A CHIPPED HEADSTOCK ON THE BACK CORNER,A BIG DING ON THE FRONT OF HEADSTOCK (SEE PICS FOR CONDITION) ALSO THE GOLD HARDWARE HAS BEEN WORN AND HAS OXIDATION FROM SITTING UNPLAYED FOR 3 YEARS.ONE OF THE TUNER BACK IS MISSING BUT STILL STAYS IN TUNE. IF YOUR LOOKING FOR A SUPER PLAYER THAT ROCKS THIS IS FOR YOU.MY PRO GUITAR TECH HAS GONE THROUGH IT AND IT HAS A PRO SETUP AT SUPER LOW ACTION AND THE SWITCH WAS CHANGED IT SMOKES.A FRESH SET OF D'ADDario 10'S HAVE ALSO BEEN INSTALLED AND THE WHOLE SET UP AND STRING DEAL COAT ME $60 SO YOUR GOOD TO GO. GUITAR COMES SHIPPED IN SOFT CASE FOR AUCTION PRICE.IT IS PICTURED WITH A NICE GATOR HARD SHELL CASE SORRY THIS IS NOT INCLUDED IN AUCTION PRICE AS I USE IT FOR OTHER LES PAUL SHAPED GUITARS. IF THE WINNER WOULD LIKE THE HSC INSTEAD JUST LET ME KNOW AND I WILL ADD $40 TO THE INVOICE. I PLAY GUITAR AND DRUMS AND HAVE A MASSIVE COLLECTION OF BOTH. I ALWAYS LOVE GETTING A NEW TOY AND WOULD BARTER FOR OTHER GEAR OR ANYTHING OF VALUE OR INTEREST. LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU HAVE THAT YOU DONT USE OR WANT. PAY-PAL PREFERREDUSA SHIPPING PREFERRED,CONTACT FIRST AS YOU WOULD HAVE TO BUY THE HSC FOR SHIPPING AND SHIPPING WOULD BE HIGHERSHIPPING PRICE IS FOR CONT 48 ONLY AND "WILL BE THE SAME FOR ALL" PLEASE REMEMBER THIS!!!!AS-IS AUCTION,NO RETURNS,REFUNDS OR BS I EXPLAINED THE CONDITION AND THE PICS SHOW THE CONDITIONTHANX FOR READING!!!!
